text.data: Matelite: Princess [character][0x1] is in the fortress up ahead!![end1][end]
Princess [character][0x1]!![0xfc][0x18] Matelite is on his way!![end1][end]
Let's go, everybody!![0xfc][0x18] This time we'll show them what we're made of!![end1][end]
Matelite: If we defeat an enemy with an indirect attack, we only get half the money!![end1][end]
Taicho: We are poor! We need money!![0xfc][0x18] Money, money, money!![end1][end]
Matelite: Crush them in head-on attacks!![0xfc][0x18] And take no prisoners!![end1][end]
Sendak: The green continent of Campbell...[0xfc][0x30] Something is in the air...[0xfc][0x18][end1][end]
